title: SAM.gov Scraper Input
description: Configure your federal contract opportunity search

naicsCodes.title: NAICS Codes
naicsCodes.description: Filter by NAICS codes (e.g., 541511 for Custom Computer Programming)

postedWithinDays.title: Posted Within (Days)
postedWithinDays.description: Only fetch opportunities posted within this many days

setAsideTypes.title: Set-Aside Types
setAsideTypes.description: Filter by set-aside type (leave empty for all)

states.title: States
states.description: Filter by place of performance state (e.g., CA, TX, VA)

downloadAttachments.title: Download Attachments
downloadAttachments.description: Download RFPs, SOWs, and other attachments (PDFs, Word docs, etc.)

extractText.title: Extract Text from Documents
extractText.description: Extract text content from PDFs and documents for searching

maxOpportunities.title: Max Opportunities
maxOpportunities.description: Maximum number of opportunities to fetch

apiKey.title: SAM.gov API Key
apiKey.description: Your SAM.gov API key (get one at https://sam.gov/content/entity-api)
